review.author: DevOps
findings: Durable file-based outbound queue with atomic .tmp+rename writes
Dual flush paths: targeted (register/heartbeat) + global (30s timer). Timer is unref'd.
Queue normalization handles corrupt files, missing fields, TTL expiry, max-entries pruning
Flush reentrancy guard prevents concurrent flush overlap
persistIfOffline:false opt-out for internal routing prevents double-delivery
Env-configurable: max entries, max age, flush interval, file path
3 integration tests cover queue-flush-register, survive-restart, max-entries enforcement

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
